item.title: Few-Shot Continual Learning for Activity Recognition in Classroom Surveillance Images
item.description:
ARIC Dataset

ARIC is a new multi-modal dataset for continual learning, which is proposed to promote future studies on continual learning for activity recognition in classroom scenes.

Download ARIC Dataset

Usage License: All files in the ARIC dataset can be used for academic purposes only, but any commercial use is prohibited.

Baidu Drive: https://pan.baidu.com/s/1HReDzU5cXWo8_jndXhKKzg?pwd=cfeb

Google Drive: https://dl.orangedox.com/Uo18BbVsXatlrR7DiF

(To count downloads, the link to Google Drive is published via ORANGEDOX.)

The directory structure of the dataset is as follows:

ARIC-dataset/
            index/
            ├── train/
            │   ├── train_0.txt
            │   ├── train_1.txt
            │   └── ...
            ├── test/
            │   ├── test_0.txt
            │   ├── test_1.txt
            │   └── ...
            image_features/
            ├── vit
            ├── clipvit
            └── resnet
            audio/
            ├── wav_00001.wav
            ├── wav_00002.wav
            └── ...
            text/
            ├── 00001.txt
            ├── 00002.txt
            └── ...
            Readme.md

Note for data files

For your convenience in utilizing our dataset, we also provide a dataloader.

It comes with preset task configurations, which can be controlled by passing parameters to specify the data sources and task settings you wish to access.

Due to space limitations, please refer to the ReadMe.md of ARIC-dataset for more details about dataloader.

If you have any questions, please contact us.
